abstract: Neutrality Law and Johnson Act: problems in credits to Brit discussed
snippet: Whether Mr. Roosevelt or Mr. Willkie is elected President on Tuesday, Washington has before it the problem of getting more aid to Great Britain in the war against Hitler....

headline.main: BIGGER AID FOR BRITAIN WASHINGTON'S PROBLEM; Regardless of Who Is Elected Tuesday, United States Must Face the Task Of Speeding Our Assistance IT WILL PRESENT MANY ANGLES

lead_paragraph: Whether Mr. Roosevelt or Mr. Willkie is elected President on Tuesday, Washington has before it the problem of getting more aid to Great Britain in the war against Hitler.
